plugin.name: iLoc
plugin.description: Locator in SeisComP implemented by the plugin lociloc.

parameter.name: auxDir
parameter.description: iLoc directory for auxialiary files and directories. Some of them must be provided from the iLoc website. Read the documentation for their installation.

parameter.name: profiles
parameter.description: iLoc profile name. Multiples names may be set separated by comma. Each profile can have different velocity or parameters.

group.name: profile
group.description: Profiles containing the specific locator parameters. For the global models, iasp91 and ak135, profiles are automatically considered with defaults. To adjust the profile parameters the corresponding profile must be created.

parameter.name: globalModel
parameter.description: Name of globally applied velocity model into which RSTT or the local model is integrated. If unset, the name of the profile is considered instead.

parameter.name: UseRSTT
parameter.description: Use regional seismic travel-time tables

parameter.name: UseRSTTPnSn
parameter.description: Use regional seismic travel-time tables for Pn and Sn

parameter.name: UseRSTTPgLg
parameter.description: Use regional seismic travel-time tables for Pg and Lg

parameter.name: UseLocalTT
parameter.description: Use local velocity model if defined in LocalVmodel.

parameter.name: LocalVmodel
MaxLocalTTDelta
parameter.description: Maximum epicentral distance for applying the local velocity model.

parameter.name: DoGridSearch
parameter.description: Perform neighbourhood algorithm

parameter.name: NAsearchRadius
parameter.description: Neighbourhood Algorithm: Search radius around initial epicentre

parameter.name: NAsearchDepth
parameter.description: Neighbourhood Algorithm: Search radius around initial depth

parameter.name: NAsearchOT
parameter.description: Neighbourhood Algorithm: Search radius around initial origin time

parameter.name: NAlpNorm
parameter.description: Neighbourhood Algorithm: p-value for norm to compute misfit [1,2]

parameter.name: NAiterMax
parameter.description: Neighbourhood Algorithm: Maximum number of iterations

parameter.name: NAcells
parameter.description: Neighbourhood Algorithm: Number of cells to be resampled at each iteration

parameter.name: NAinitialSample
parameter.description: Neighbourhood Algorithm: Size of initial sample

parameter.name: NAnextSample
parameter.description: Neighbourhood Algorithm: Size of subsequent samples

parameter.name: MinDepthPhases
parameter.description: Depth resolution: Minimum number of depth phases for depdp

parameter.name: MaxLocalDistDeg
parameter.description: Depth resolution: Maximum local distance

parameter.name: MinLocalStations
parameter.description: Depth resolution: Minimum number of local defining stations

parameter.name: MaxSPDistDeg
parameter.description: Depth resolution: Maximum distance for using S-P travel-time differences.

parameter.name: MinSPpairs
parameter.description: Depth resolution: Minimum number of defining S-P phase pairs

parameter.name: MinCorePhases
parameter.description: Depth resolution: Minimum number of defining core reflection phases

parameter.name: MaxShallowDepthError
parameter.description: Depth resolution: Maximum depth error for crustal free-depth

parameter.name: MaxDeepDepthError
parameter.description: Depth resolution: Maximum depth error for deep free-depth

parameter.name: DoCorrelatedErrors
parameter.description: Linearized inversion: Account for correlated errors

parameter.name: SigmaThreshold
parameter.description: Linearized inversion: Used to exclude big residuals from solution

parameter.name: AllowDamping
parameter.description: Linearized inversion: Allow damping of model vector

parameter.name: MinIterations
parameter.description: Linearized inversion: Minimum number of iterations

parameter.name: MaxIterations
parameter.description: Linearized inversion: Maximum number of iterations

parameter.name: MinNdefPhases
parameter.description: Linearized inversion: Minimum number of defining phases

parameter.name: DoNotRenamePhases
parameter.description: Linearized inversion: Do not rename phases. Deactivating allows to rename the phases automatically for this profile.
